title: Marketing website for HS Media Agency with contact info and inquiry form

requirements.text: Create a responsive marketing website for a social media marketing agency named “HS Media Agency” with clear, English-language copy and a single-page layout that includes at minimum: a hero section, a services section, an about/why-us section, and a contact section.

quotes: Create a website for social media marketing agency name HS Media Agency

acceptanceCriteria: The site prominently displays the name “HS Media Agency” in the header/hero.
The page includes distinct sections for Hero, Services, About/Why Us, and Contact (or equivalent clearly labeled sections).
Layout is responsive and looks correct on mobile and desktop (no overlapping or cut-off content).

requirements.text: Display the provided contact details in the contact section and anywhere else appropriate (e.g., header/footer): phone number +919234473077, email Teamharshsingh@gmail.com, and location Bihar.

quotes: with contact details like number +919234473077 email Teamharshsingh@gmail.com and location bihar

acceptanceCriteria: Phone number is shown exactly as “+919234473077”.
Contact details are visible without requiring login.

requirements.text: Add an inquiry form that allows visitors to submit an inquiry to HS Media Agency. The form must include at least: full name, email, phone (optional), service interest (select), message, and a consent/acknowledgement checkbox; show inline validation and a success/error result state after submission.
acceptanceCriteria: Form validates required fields (name, email, service interest, message, consent) and blocks submission until valid.
On successful submission, the UI shows a clear success confirmation and resets or disables the form appropriately.
On failure, the UI shows a clear error message without losing the user’s typed content.
Inquiry submissions are sent to the backend and persisted (at least in canister memory) with a timestamp.

requirements.text: Implement backend support for inquiry submissions in the single Motoko main actor: define an Inquiry record type, store inquiries, and expose a public method to create an inquiry (and an optional method to list inquiries for future use).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a method that the frontend can call to submit an inquiry with the form fields.
Inquiries are stored in backend state and include a server-side timestamp.
Backend method performs basic input checks (e.g., non-empty required strings).

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme consistently across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and section styling) suitable for a modern marketing agency brand. Do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent theme is applied across all sections (buttons, headings, cards, backgrounds).
Typography hierarchy is clear (distinct heading/subheading/body styles).

requirements.text: Generate required static images and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via the backend). Use the images in the marketing page layout (e.g., hero and branding).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
The images are visible in the UI (e.g., logo in header and a hero visual).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in the main actor file).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths; compose those components instead.
Use English for all user-facing website text.
nonGoals: Sending inquiries via email/SMS or integrating with external CRMs.
A multi-page CMS for editing content.

required: Modern minimalist logo mark and wordmark for “HS Media Agency” (hs-media-agency-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Abstract social-media/marketing themed hero illustration with clean shapes and high contrast (hs-media-agency-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
